snippet: Adebayo O. Ogunlesi is well-known on Wall Street, having run the investment bank at Credit Suisse in the last decade. Since 2006, he has run Global Infrastructure Partners, a private equity firm that invests in infrastructure deals like energy...
abstract: Adebayo O. Ogunlesi is well-known on Wall Street, having run the investment bank at Credit Suisse in the last decade. Since 2006, he has run Global Infrastructure Partners, a private equity firm that invests in infrastructure deals like energy projects and water companies.
